title: What is the Dubai tennis schedule?
description: Day 2 of the 2025 Dubai Duty Free Tennis Championships features a star-studded lineup with former champions Daniil Medvedev and Andrey Rublev, defending champion Ugo Humbert, Alex de Minaur and more in action on Tuesday. De Minaur will kickstart his quest for a first title this season in his opening match on the Centre Court against Marin Cilic. Rublev, fresh off his title at the Qatar ExxonMobil Open, will then take on Quentin Halys. Top seed Medvedev will face Jan-Lennard Struff after. On Court 1, Humbert will start his title defence against Jiri Lehecka. Doubles matches will take place on Court 2 and Court 3 with top seeds Marcelo Arevalo and Mate Pavic in action. View the full Dubai Tuesday order of play below. ORDER OF PLAY - TUESDAY, 25 FEBRUARY 2025 Centre Court - start 2 p.m. Marin Cilic (CRO) vs [2] Alex de Minaur (AUS) Not Before 4 p.m. [Q] Quentin Halys (FRA) vs [3] Andrey Rublev Not Before 6:30 p.m. [1] Daniil Medvedev vs Jan-Lennard Struff (GER) Gael Monfils (FRA) vs Matteo Berrettini (ITA) Court 1 - start 2:00 p.m. [8] Arthur Fils (FRA) vs Nuno Borges (POR) Alexander Bublik (KAZ) vs Felix Auger-Aliassime (CAN) Jiri Lehecka (CZE) vs [5] Ugo Humbert (FRA) [Q] Christopher O'Connell (AUS) vs [6] Grigor Dimitrov (BUL) Court 2 - start 2:00 p.m. [1] Marcelo Arevalo (ESA) / Mate Pavic (CRO) vs Yuki Bhambri (IND) / Alexei Popyrin (AUS) [Q] Robin Haase (NED) / Hendrik Jebens (GER) vs [WC] Pavlos Tsitsipas (GRE) / Petros Tsitsipas (GRE) Jamie Murray (GBR) / John Peers (AUS) vs [WC] Jeevan Nedunchezhiyan (IND) / Vijay Sundar Prashanth (IND) Court 3 - start 2:00 p.m. [LL] Luca Nardi (ITA) vs [Q] Marton Fucsovics (HUN) [Q] Roman Safiullin vs Tallon Griekspoor (NED) Nikola Mektic (CRO) / Michael Venus (NZL) vs [2] Harri Heliovaara (FIN) / Henry Patten (GBR) [NEWSLETTER FORM]
excerpt: The 2025 Dubai Duty Free Tennis Championships gets underway Monday. Stefanos Tsitsipas, Roberto Bautista Agut, and Karen Khachanov headline action on Day 1.

html:
Dubai

Medvedev, Rublev, Humbert, De Minaur play Tuesday

February 25, 2025

Christopher Pike/Getty Images

The 2025 Dubai Duty Free Tennis Championships concludes on 1 March. By ATP Staff

Day 2 of the 2025 Dubai Duty Free Tennis Championships features a star-studded lineup with former champions Daniil Medvedev and Andrey Rublev, defending champion Ugo Humbert, Alex de Minaur and more in action on Tuesday.

De Minaur will kickstart his quest for a first title this season in his opening match on the Centre Court against Marin Cilic. Rublev, fresh off his title at the Qatar ExxonMobil Open, will then take on Quentin Halys. Top seed Medvedev will face Jan-Lennard Struff after. On Court 1, Humbert will start his title defence against Jiri Lehecka. Doubles matches will take place on Court 2 and Court 3 with top seeds Marcelo Arevalo and Mate Pavic in action.

View the full Dubai Tuesday order of play below.

ORDER OF PLAY - TUESDAY, 25 FEBRUARY 2025
Centre Court - start 2 p.m.
Marin Cilic (CRO) vs [2] Alex de Minaur (AUS)

Not Before 4 p.m.
[Q] Quentin Halys (FRA) vs [3] Andrey Rublev

Not Before 6:30 p.m.
[1] Daniil Medvedev vs Jan-Lennard Struff (GER)
Gael Monfils (FRA) vs Matteo Berrettini (ITA)

Court 1 - start 2:00 p.m.
[8] Arthur Fils (FRA) vs Nuno Borges (POR)
Alexander Bublik (KAZ) vs Felix Auger-Aliassime (CAN)
Jiri Lehecka (CZE) vs [5] Ugo Humbert (FRA)
[Q] Christopher O'Connell (AUS) vs [6] Grigor Dimitrov (BUL)

Court 2 - start 2:00 p.m.
[1] Marcelo Arevalo (ESA) / Mate Pavic (CRO) vs Yuki Bhambri (IND) / Alexei Popyrin (AUS)
[Q] Robin Haase (NED) / Hendrik Jebens (GER) vs [WC] Pavlos Tsitsipas (GRE) / Petros Tsitsipas (GRE)
Jamie Murray (GBR) / John Peers (AUS) vs [WC] Jeevan Nedunchezhiyan (IND) / Vijay Sundar Prashanth (IND)

Court 3 - start 2:00 p.m.
[LL] Luca Nardi (ITA) vs [Q] Marton Fucsovics (HUN)
[Q] Roman Safiullin vs Tallon Griekspoor (NED)
Nikola Mektic (CRO) / Michael Venus (NZL) vs [2] Harri Heliovaara (FIN) / Henry Patten (GBR)
